metadata.name: ALAGERE (The Hunters Drum)
metadata.description:
... in  society  where  we  tend  to  forget  things  of  the  past all because  of  civilization,  there  are  men who  sacrifice  the night  in  helping  to  get  meat  around  and  save  guarding  of our  community HUNTERS .  Despite the fact  that  they don't  have  all  day  to  work(hunt)  and  rest  ,they  still  give rooms to  thanks  their  Ancestors  and Creator  for  journey mercy  with  so  much joy  and  adoration.   They    make sounds through  their  nice  voice  and  drums (AGERE) 

MEDIUM 
A mixmedia Art 
Acrylic and cloth on canvas
